EmailTemplate.name: Follow up from CIO event in NYC (1495214557.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up from CIO event in NYC (1495214557.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Amit, I wanted to check in now that the CIO event is over and we are all back at work. I am sure you had conversations with a lot of people during the event so might not remember talking to Turbonomic but I wanted to touch base and hop on a call in the next week to continue our discussion. We won’t know if Turbonomic can be of value until we have a discussion surrounding both of our companies and our values. Are you available next Tuesday for a phone call? Best,Katie Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
